Zandalar Illusionist's Wraps

(2) Set : Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 12.
(3) Set : Decreases the mana cost of Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance by 5%.
(5) Set : Reduces the casting time of your Flamestrike spell by 0.5 sec.
